column3: “And then there's Allen Wrench. When it comes to the Wrench, don't flail around with grams: go right for an eighter. You'll appreciate the bag of High Times centerfold buds -- compact, rippled with red hairs and powdered with a dusting of white crystals; this is some of da kind that demands your attention. Don't just snap off a bud and cram it in your pipe, you fucking Philistine! No, stop and admire. Breathe in the c...”

“(Very) Novice smoker here. The first time I smoked Allen Wrench, it was a fat joint that put me into a strange, trippy, dissociative state. It was exceedingly bizarre, and probably won't even sound plausible if I wrote about it here. Anyways, I took a shower, crashed, and was fine the next day. I'll chalk that up to being an inexperienced smoker with a super dank strain. 

The next time I smoked it, I was sure to smo...”

“Strain: Allen Wrench (Trainwreck / NYC Diesel cross -- Sativa)
THC: 21.64%
CBD: 0.08%
Location found: KaLeafa 
Date purchased: 4.5.16
Price: $40.50 for a ¼ ($45.00 with -10% off on Thursdays...no longer -20% :(  )  
Weight: 7.0g crammed into a small container
Method of Consumption: Herb Iron and small bong 
Smell: The smell was the main reason I went home with this strain. It is an awesome blend of heritages. Mexican...”

“this strain should come with a warning: not for anyone but the biggest sativa fans. people prone to anxiety may be made uncomfortable by the intensely jittery, mental (as in 'really get into your head') qualities of this strain. in my experience (70+ strains), and being a 'sativa guy' for the most part, I haven't encountered a more energizing, jittery strain. cinex is the closest I've tried, and it's still nowhere ne...”
“You're hired!" "Oh my god! Fuck yes! ...errr.. I mean.. thank you
column4: sir. You won't be disappointed." You walk out the door. You walk towards the elevator. Your happiness rises inside of you
column5: getting ready to burst. The elevator doors open
column7: and you're the only one inside. So you know what that means. The elevator doors close. DANCE PARTY!!! *oonse oonse oonse oonse oonse oonse oonse* Elevator doors upon. ...”"

column3: “It's like smoking a massively trippy strain while drinking a giant red bull.  So much energy and quick intelligent internal dialogue.  Yet there is a relaxing mental buzz that makes you feel good even through the jitteryness.  This was much stronger than I expected and a lot of fun.  I would not recommend it for sleep at all.  This is for staying up late watching science documentaries and contemplating the universe. ...”

“Does exactly what it's supposed to do. I was getting a bit stressed and needed something to calm me down while cheer me up and this was exactly what I need. Everything was great during my high and I was also still productive! Allen Wrench is now my favorite strain.”
“This is definitely a strain that I'd recommend for people with depression or anxiety. It really gets me excited to do activities and go outside. I'm very smiley and giggly after smoking this.”

“Initially, I would have given this strain a lower rating if it were not for the complex taste, aroma, and sneaky psycho affects that almost wrap your cerebral in a warm, comforting blanket. The flower itself was unappealing (which could be attributed to the flushing and curing) yet effective in its yield and the accumulation of keif. I was impressively surprised how relaxing it was though there were no indica-dominan...”

“Holy shit. 
Ok, now that we have that out of the way, let me start by saying that I am currently on Allenwrench. I love this shit. This is my go to, every day strain. Allenwrench is about as much sativa I can handle and I do have to be sitting for the first few minutes because it really gets my mind going. But after my mind catches up and realizes we are alright, its great. love love LOVE this strain”

“Got this stuff from Nectar in Portland at a budget price. Not the greatest looking buds, but a really nice strain. I tend to go as sativa as possible, digging Durban, hazes, like that to replace my Rx ADD medication. These strains work well both to help with concentration and sleep, for me. For reference, Ghost Train Haze is my gold standard strain, when I can get it. The Allen Wrench is very well balanced; not super...”

“My absolute favorite strain!!!! Very solid high. I mean imagine your favorite high, but at the same you’re just pre-occupied by so many things but this time you actually finish everything. Gives you purpose. Good for sativa lovers, probably only good for them (my friend didnt like this as much as I did, he has constant anxiety attacks and paranoia). Long lasting high tho. I’d smoke this everyday if I’m even allowed t...”

“This strain brought creative vibes & really helped with creating ideas to further myself to greatness. The first couple of puffs, it tasted like pine cones. But once I felt like I was on that higher level. It tastes sweet and a little sour like a lemon & orange.”
“I'm my turn self when I'm high off Allen.”
“This is my go-to weed especially at social gatherings etc. This strain has all the best qualities but it gets you really fucking high so proceed with caution lol.”
“Reminds me of a better version of that NYC Sour Diesel from back in the day. Trainwreck cross is a nice touch, helps tone down the diesel taste and bring in more citrus. A go to sativa for sure.”
“Reminds me of a better version of that NYC Sour Diesel from back in the day. Trainwreck cross is a nice touch, helps tone down the diesel taste and bring in more citrus. A go to sativa for sure.”
“This one is my new favorite. Very similar to Jack Herer strains, but a little heavier hitting.”

“This strain is pow!!! Gets you a super uplifting high with a great taste and smooth smoke not very harsh at all even when the bowl is almost ass and still tastes good and the smell is unbelievable super earthy citrus and could smell it from across my house, great strain won't regret”
“This shit made me think way too much haha I've started calling it the truth serum"
column4: because it makes me just start spilling all of my secrets.

column2: and the smell is amazing. The flood of emotions however
column3: I could have lived without.”"

“Allen Wrench stands out to me for the smell which is strong & gives a jolt to the senses.  As this dense bud is broken up the smell is amplified giving a little foreshadowing to the upcoming buzz.  The taste which is exactly like the odor except with a little more bite to it which might be felt in throat.  Good to keep some cold liquid nearby if there are any breathing sensitivities or if easily irritated by spicier ...”
“Great Hybrid.......get some it is high octane......dense buds.....great buz....”

“So Sativa !

Great Uplifting Smooth Sativa strain! All day kind of bud. Euphoric and fun times with this great strain!

85% Sativa”
“I read through strands for a few hours and picked this one up with some others. It was my favorite even though I had higher THC level waxes because it was everything it said it was.”

“So Sativa !

Great Uplifting Smooth Sativa strain! All day kind of bud. Euphoric and fun times with this great strain!

85% Sativa”

“Delightful to vape, and it does what was promised. I asked the bud tender for something motivating, and this is it. I love the way it makes me feel like digging into projects I have procrastinated about for months. It's a pleasant, happy but slightly self-concious high, not good for evening unless you want to be bubbly for a party. No couch-lock, body high or libido enhancement. Perfect to start the day. Munchies and...”
“I'm my turn self when I'm high off Allen.”
“Great Hybrid.......get some it is high octane......dense buds.....great buz....”
“This is far by my favorite strain. I felt happy, giggly, & the high lasted for awhile.”
“This one is my new favorite. Very similar to Jack Herer strains, but a little heavier hitting.”

“Great strain for creative types. Gives you a peaceful, focused feeling and seemingly makes you want to complete goals. I smoked a spliff of this citrusy tasting strain then proceeded to write an awesome story, cleaned my kitchen, and went for a peaceful walk taking in all the sights with an amazing head high. 10/10 would smoke again.”

“Wow, this is a great strain. Used it for the very first time today. It smells slightly fruity; light and sweet. At fist i thought it felt very immediately strong, but I was wrong. It creeps up on you for a few after that initial strong high, and just gets stronger. Even at its peak, a very comfortable cerebral high with a mild body tingle. No lack of ability to function, no paranoia, no runaway brain. Slight couch lo...”
“Great Hybrid.......get some it is high octane......dense buds.....great buz....”
“Perfect wake and bake. I have a lot of migraines and back and shoulder pain - this strain took all of that away and made my day 10× better.”
“Very dense, thick, brick-like nuggets with sharp/tangy smell, this strain is perfect for morning use after a long night of tossing and turning from pain.”

“Very smooth and clear-headed high although it stars with heavy halo. Not a lazy type flowed at all, very relaxing and calming but not tiring. 7/10 strength and 8/10 high quality for this particular grower; Artizen”

“First impressions of this strain are that it is aromatic and quite tasty. Strong citrus and floral flavors come through right away; delightful to smoke. Beyond that, the effects of the strain came in waves for me. First, it made me feel creative, energetic, and intently focused on whatever activity I was taking part in. After about an hour or two of continually smoking, the energizing effects gave way to overpowering...”
“Buds ultra dense trichome frosted, complex smell and taste but as an indica guy this pure sativa is a 10/10 . All depends whom produced the cut though mind you. Yes”
“Nice heady affect with juicy flavors.”

“When grown well, this beautiful sativa with classic indica flower structure and mild, honey, woody flavor can deliver a quite nice sativa high for about an hour before before setting into a very mellow indica back.”
“Buds ultra dense trichome frosted, complex smell and taste but as an indica guy this pure sativa is a 10/10 . All depends whom produced the cut though mind you. Yes”
“Very dense, thick, brick-like nuggets with sharp/tangy smell, this strain is perfect for morning use after a long night of tossing and turning from pain.”

“Definitely my favorite strain that I've tried. Citrus smell thats easy to contain. The high makes me happy, peaceful and constructive. Allen Wrench is perfect for nature walks or any other day time activity. :)”

“First impressions of this strain are that it is aromatic and quite tasty. Strong citrus and floral flavors come through right away; delightful to smoke. Beyond that, the effects of the strain came in waves for me. First, it made me feel creative, energetic, and intently focused on whatever activity I was taking part in. After about an hour or two of continually smoking, the energizing effects gave way to overpowering...”

“Very smooth and clear-headed high although it stars with heavy halo. Not a lazy type flowed at all, very relaxing and calming but not tiring. 7/10 strength and 8/10 high quality for this particular grower; Artizen”
“Nice heady affect with juicy flavors.”

“When grown well, this beautiful sativa with classic indica flower structure and mild, honey, woody flavor can deliver a quite nice sativa high for about an hour before before setting into a very mellow indica back.”

“This is actually one of my favorite strains I've tried since moving to California. I get such a happy, giddy high from this weed, and with the more I smoke, the better it gets. Definitely a high to be enjoyed around other people.”
“Very good mood, gives me a grateful outlook on life, and helps me focus on work easily. Not too much energy.”
“Full energy and creativeness. Everything is so beautiful after some of this. But still easy enough to stay focused. Taste great too.”

“Lately all the bud I've been getting has been the best Bud I've ever smoked. Here's another one that looks amazing bright green super dense with dark orange hairs and covered in a white frost. It smells very strongly of citrus, it smells very bright, and fresh. The smoke is dense, very smooth, with a very strong flavor of oranges I think. The high is all head but very strong I feel it alot in my temples and behind th...”

“First impressions of this strain are that it is aromatic and quite tasty. Strong citrus and floral flavors come through right away; delightful to smoke. Beyond that, the effects of the strain came in waves for me. First, it made me feel creative, energetic, and intently focused on whatever activity I was taking part in. After about an hour or two of continually smoking, the energizing effects gave way to overpowering...”
“my new workout strain. perfect for keeping fit.”

“This is actually one of my favorite strains I've tried since moving to California. I get such a happy, giddy high from this weed, and with the more I smoke, the better it gets. Definitely a high to be enjoyed around other people.”

“used a pax2 for this
really nice flavor all the way through. Did have a nice smell while grinding it. Definitely helped getting me out of my funk and a lot more uplifted and absolutely relaxed.”
“Thick smoke, didn't have much of that weed" smell.  Uplifting high
column4: good for my depression. Made me super forgetful.  I use it mostly for daytime
column5: but it is fine at night too if that's what you want.”"

column3: “Fantastic mix of a couple great strains.”

“What is up with all of these children reviewing cannabis on here?  Seriously some of these reviews need to be removed  they are just stupid.  On another note this strain is an awesome pungent sour smoke with earthy hints, active engaged high.  If cultivating I suggest watching your nutrients as it burns very easily, it also stretches alot so be ready to top, train, and or scrog.”
“It is fire indeed. Smells like my compost, but that's a good thing. Tha high is a smack in tha face jus like trainwreck. You will enjoy it if sativa is yo thang.”
“got it at the herbalist farmer its good”
“Ladies and gentleman of the cannabus community, I would like to inform you that this shit will rock your world. Period. Tastes like an angels buttcheek on a nice summer day. The high is exquisite.”
“very strong smelling and sticky. good long-lasting giggly high.”

“definitely one of my favorites. A few eighths of this in conjunction with a few other cannabis products made a really great year for me! found it off foster in se fopo pdx and wish I could have bought the place out of this strain. 
3 pipe hits for mild stoney affect
5 hits for complete staring at the wind" stoned.

column1: ideal for mid afternoon use or evening post-shower.”"

column3: “Fast hitting. Great to relax but also works great while working. Doesn't make you lethargic”
“Felt the effects of the high up to FIVE hours after I smoked. Very strong stuff.”

“Love sativas.. But this one made me quite paranoid. I'm from NY and had similar findings with that flower as well. Thought this was interesting being that one of this stain's grandparents is based in NY.. and wanted to share :) cheers!”

“It's a good sativa but I'm not buying anymore. it hit like a hybrid or something, strait to the dome yo then couchlock. smells good,looks nice. this strain is like a hot chick you sleep with, but she sucks in bed. looks great but don't deliver. it's a bit racey an blasts you out there, don't last long. alot of other hybrids can do the same thing.”
“Great for gaming or jamming with friends”
“Not bad, but not amazing. It's definitely a strong sativa. I was expecting a bit more of a punch given the parents. There's nothing really special about it though.”
“Floral, diesel smell with sweet citrus taste. The smells fills the room and makes you want more.”
“A good smoke to get something done and enjoy the day for sure. Would be great for hiking or working out pain free. Wonderful smell, curious taste.”
“Smoked this and ended watching 2 chainz music videos for 3 hours. 10/10”

“Very up high on this one. I should be far more hungover this Saturday morning, but the ol' Wrench is apparently getting to work. Nice pep-up with this business; excellent to listen to music with, and just, in the words of Althea and Donna, Uptown Top Ranking. Got a lot of cleaning/dancing done, an activity it not only enables, but encourages. This one is a recommend if you can find it. Very strong, so be warned. You ...”
“A good productive and happy high with some awesome relief for my pain!”
“Really a phenomenal strain!! Helps me focus so much!!”
“This is an incredible get shit done" strain. It rewards you with great levels of focus and creativity and are really helpful for add. Helped me read and take notes for HOURS”"

“Gets you up and doing! It also helps you muse on philosophical topics and the meaning of life, the universe and everything.... I like active creative and euphoric highs for doing craft work and this was very helpful. I find it was less creative in the visual/design realm and more creative in the introspective/inductive reasoning realm.”

“Perfect combination of cerebral and body. The cohesion makes it the perfect weed to workout with. When I smoke this, I am in tune with my muscles in a way that makes me feel confident that I’m getting the most out of my workout. At the same time, I’m stretching and relaxing. I know what’s too much and where that limit is. Add music to amplify the greatness. Be safe! :)”

“definitely one of my favorites. A few eighths of this in conjunction with a few other cannabis products made a really great year for me! found it off foster in se fopo pdx and wish I could have bought the place out of this strain. 
3 pipe hits for mild stoney affect
5 hits for complete staring at the wind" stoned.

column1: ideal for mid afternoon use or evening post-shower.”"

column3: “Ladies and gentleman of the cannabus community, I would like to inform you that this shit will rock your world. Period. Tastes like an angels buttcheek on a nice summer day. The high is exquisite.”
“fun and silly and creative! woody/earthy but also a lil fruity. loved it!!”
“Great high.. but you're still very active.”
“this strain enhances my moods if i am angry it keeps me there and will make it worse”
“Everything a sativa should be.”
“love the sweet taste.. such a bubbly head high. my boyfriend and I smoked one bowl of this baby and we got the munchies out and watched out favorite movies.”
“Strong head high. No full body relaxation.  Great if you're not hungry but want to be.”

“I love this so much!  I've been so energetic and full of energy and NO MUNCHIES!!!  That's so huge for me,  I always get the munchies but not with this..  Will definitely be buying this as my main strain...”

“Allen Wrench is now my favorite, head and shoulders above the rest. I can tend toward anxiety when high. This is the least anxiety producing vs most body and mind glee inducing pot I have had in a long time. Just awesome.”
“paid 25 dollars for 4 grams at Highway 7 recreational despenserary it was a good deal and it's good bud I would recommend getting”
“5 Star Sativa. Found a dank issue of this beautiful Sativa at OMG in Sylmar. Earthy pungent slightly fruity.  Very smooth smoke.   Not to speedy but very uplifting.  Tightens the head up. A+”
“Very disappointed the batch I got was very weak I read the reviews and expected much stover but found this not meeting expectations”
“I love the weed”
“Probably my favorite Sativia.”
“Good daytime buzz. Kinda strong but productive”
“It is good and gives me a pick up”
“Nice high feeling. I love the sour citris scent too!!!!!”
“got it at the herbalist farmer its good”
“It is fire indeed. Smells like my compost, but that's a good thing. Tha high is a smack in tha face jus like trainwreck. You will enjoy it if sativa is yo thang.”

“What is up with all of these children reviewing cannabis on here?  Seriously some of these reviews need to be removed  they are just stupid.  On another note this strain is an awesome pungent sour smoke with earthy hints, active engaged high.  If cultivating I suggest watching your nutrients as it burns very easily, it also stretches alot so be ready to top, train, and or scrog.”
“Fantastic mix of a couple great strains.”
“very strong smelling and sticky. good long-lasting giggly high.”
“I liked the Allen Wrench it had an underlying anti-anxiety effect.”
“Clean, clear and awesome for bicycle rides!”
“Like everyone else says, it's remarkably energetic. Too energetic for me. Jittery. Next time I will wake and bake with this. Not a relaxing strain. It will take care of your to-do list though.”

“Great cerebral high not long after smoking, great general uplifting pleasant blaze. I have high tolerance, maybe a bit much for an unseasoned sativa smoker. Soft and smooth in bong or pipe, seems wasteful to smoke a j because only a couple hits is enough to get me a ticket to the happy place.”
“Hits like a truck, tastes like lemongrass. Nice strong cerebral high.”

“Great for evenings which may include interacting with other smokers, you will have some good old fashioned heavy conversation". Body high among the best I've felt from a sativa. I will make this one of my daytime meds on an ongoing basis. This fantastic flower was obtained at Zen Living Cooperative.”"
“Fast hitting. Great to relax but also works great while working. Doesn't make you lethargic”
“musicslug used the word jittery" and I can't think of a better word. After a hit or two
column4: I wished I'd started earlier as I wasn't sure if I'd be able to pick up my son from grandma's house! But
column5: after about 45 min to an hour I was able to function ok. So
column6: give it about that much time to peak and you should be ok to get some stuff done! Good for cleaning the house or organizing the home office.”"

column3: “Not my favorite strain. Doesn't really do much for me and I'm not a huge fan of the taste.”
“My buddy and I were high for 6 hours off of this!!! great strain.”

“I have a passion for indica strains that cause couch lock and put me to sleep.  Lately, I've been trying to branch out and explore sativas with a more energizing buzz.  So I was a little surprised to find myself so very relaxed, and nodding off, after two bowls of Allen Wrench!  A good high overall, but I had been expecting to leap off the couch in a flurry of activity.  I thought it was just me, but my sativa-loving...”
“Always a favorite sativa.”
“Sit down and just enjoy listening to pink floyd ... all said”
“my favorite”

“im on this strain at the moment i feel a head high mostly i can feel it in my body but more upstairs. good strain if

 you want to get creative

they should base cannabis on happy it makes you feel after you get past the paranoid part”
“This lasts forever! I smoke one before study and it was great. Got pretty hungry and a little paranoic.”
“its a nice but subtle high with killer kick that makes u smile”
“Hits the lungs hard with slight fruity exhale. Got all my chores done and then some.”

“This actually happened to be my first legally purchased strain! Has a great smell leaning twords a afghani diesel mix, could have just been my phenotype though. Effects are extremely euphoric, with a surprising amount of couch lock. The buds are quite dense and sticky when grown correctly, and are visually marked by long brown pistols. Great bud”
“My new fav strain!!”

“It does the trick for sure. Not one of my favorites. I overall prefer indicate dominate strains.  Tons of light headedness & dizzyness for me. I'm content and relaxed, head feels heavy, stuck on the couch.”

“I really enjoyed this, made the mistake at smoking some before bed which isn't a great idea. I was way too alert so definitely one to think about trying out before then. I don't care much for the taste at all, it seems to linger for quite some time. But overall I enjoyed it and will be keeping it around especially for days when my depression makes me feel unmotivated.”
“Great strain. Truly wakes you up. I'm still able to stay focused and keep a good sense of awareness despite the euphoric state it places you in.”

“I picked up an eighth of this, grown by Artizen Cannabis, Harvested on 11/12/2016, it was consumed on 2/8/2017.

The nugs on this one were small and dense, and completely covered in crystals. The smell is earthy and pungent, but the taste is all chemical and tar - definitely not my favorite tasting strain, thus the 4 stars.

The high comes on slowly, with some light body relaxation, but creeps up on you and hits hard...”
“good taste, strong buzz, small buds, lotsa buds actually.”
“This is a great sativa! It had me zoning in and out. I was able to get alot of work done and still wasn't tired. Highly recommended for the day.”
“very good head high”
“Great taste and the high allows you to be productive yet frees your mind!”

“The flavor is spicy with a hint of candy. It smells like sweet flowers with a hint of spice. It will give you the munchies for sure. Great first thing in the morning....  if you have nothing else planned.”
“I loved this strain, it was nice and smooth with bold citrusy taste. After I smoked I just kept getting higher and higher. I definitely recommend this strain.”

“This was recommended by a budtender in WA and WOW! I totally agree with her.  I found it to be pretty smooth with a nice taste.  Long lasting, focused buzz.  This is my new favorite (except for the extremely dry mouth)!!!!”

“I'm a indica guy but this Sativa's uplifting buzz is really great. Most Sativa's mess with my head this one pleasantly does NOT. It's nice being able to keep smoking and not get locked. Really earthy with a hint of lemon.”
“my go to for when I need to get some drawings done for school”
“String head high. Long lasting. I feel really focused right now :)”
“Had Alen wrench before by different grower. Loved that one! This 1g preroll did absolutely nada. Very disappointing & won't spend $ on anything artizen brand again.”
“Dis weeds tho! Sativa af my home skillets. Don't be shmokin thiz b4 a nappy nap. Peep that earthy lemonish smizzle”

“Very potent. Puts you down. Don't smoke too much of it at once. I'd recommend the j1 over this strain unless you just want to be messed out of your mind and not feel in control. It definetly can make you the highest you've ever been haha”
“From Island in the Sky”
“Stoney head, eye lock.  Silly, slowed down.  I think my menstrual cramps went away!”
